Module roborally

Package client.view

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActivationController
    This class represents the activation phase in the ui.
    ChatController
    This method represents the chat for chatting with other players and direct chatting.
    ConstructionController
    This class represents the construction phase where the player should set their starting point.
    Controller
    Abstract super class of all view-controller, which also stores information and required attributes for dragging and dropping between ProgrammingController and PlayerMatController.
    GameBoardController
    Controller for the 2d gameboard displayed in the GameView and ServerView.
    GameController
    The GameViewController class controls the GameView and coordinates its inner views.
    GameWonController
    This class is responsible for announcing the winner and ending the game.
    LobbyController
    This class displays the joined and ready users and already has the possibility to chat with other users
    LoginController
    This class controls the loginView.fxml view, it takes the name and the chosen robot, sends it to client and switches to the game view
    MapController  
    MenuController
    The MenuController is the Controller for the main menu view.
    OnePlayerController
    This class represents one small playerMat of one other player, it contains all necessary information the player needs to know about other players.
    OthersController
    OthersController handles the HBox underneath the gameMat and creates as much little playerMats (onePlayer.fxml) as other player that joined and handles incoming protocol messages.
    PickDamageController
    This class represents the innerview of the activation phase for the situation that the player has to pick damage cards because the spam deck is empty.
    PlayCardController
    This method represents one inner view of the activation controller.
    PlayerMatController
    This class represents the playerMat of the player, it contains the registers where the player has to place programming cards and also information about name, figure, energy, checkpoints, discard deck count and programming deck count.
    ProgrammingController
    This class represents the programming phase, where the player chooses programming cards and puts them into his registers.
